name: Hitman: Sniper
summary: In Hitman: Sniper, you take on the role of Agent 47 in this highly competitive sniper/assassination game for phones and tablets. Set in beautiful Montenegro, you will face multiple scenario-driven contracts on one hugely varied, evolving map that contains many targets and assignments, each of them designed to be replayed, not only to finesse your approach, but to achieve the perfect score on the leaderboards.
info:
• 中文名: 杀手：狙击
  • 平台: Android
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2015年6月4日
  • 售价: $4.99
